name: 7 Didn't 8 9 (Zercury)
description:
7 Didn't 8 9 is a short 2D visual novel made in a 48-hour game jam among friends. In it, a murder has occurred amongst the clones, and its up to you to gather evidence, investigate, interrogate and accuse the culprit. Will you make the right call?

Main Features :

  • The Nine Clones - Interrogate the remaining clones and establish their alibis.
  • Minigames - Investigate the facility, find clues and solve minigames to find revelations!
  • The Final Decision - Whenever you think you are ready, accuse who you believe to be the murdered (including yourself).
  • Sick Roombas - Nothing can stand in their way.

Project Details :

  • Unity 2021.2.11f1
  • Dev Time : 48 Hours
  • Team Size :  6
  • Responsibilities: Programming and Level Design

Please feel free to report any issues in the comment section below. Thanks for playing!
